response.overview: Run The Tapes is a full-length original street skateboarding video that showcases a local skate collective, Gang Tapes. Comprised of over 25 skaters, Gang Tapes have been reimagining the streets of Las Vegas as their own skate park for the past 10 years. It is shot completely on Mini-DV tapes with the iconic Sony DCR-VX1000. Dedicated to the roots of skateboarding, director and skater Evan Sedoti has prepared a skate video unlike any other. Made in collaboration with Pharmacy Boardshop, this video has captured the culture of street skateboarding in its own style. Viewers will be immersed in a unique perspective of this city with every push through the streets of Las Vegas.
response.title: Run the Tapes
